attributes.action: Increase tax free allowance to help those most in need due to the current crisis
attributes.additional_details: It is self explanatory that immediate action is required due to projected inflation peaking to 13-14%, implementing this proposal immediately, or at least at the beginning of the the next fiscal year is in order to alleviate hardship.
attributes.background: The cost of living crisis is impacting the poorest in society the worst,  tax reductions  will only help the the more well off in society,  not state pensioners/low earners -  The increase in tax free allowances is the fairest way to implement help. I suggest an increase of 30% from £12570 to £16341

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Raise the standard Personal TAX Allowance from £12,570 to £20,000: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618661

Raise the income tax personal allowance to £15000 immediately: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617227

Increase the income tax personal allowance to £19305: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617256
